pr_title: fix consumer processError in the service bus example

timeline.message:
fix consumer process error in the service bus example

(cherry picked from commit 83dc4c38813905452dd578b746321bb8f6043a0a)
add embedme for code example of processore client

timeline.bodyText:
Add .disableAutoComplete()
By default autoComplete is enabled,  this means this SDK will internally  complete the message for you and user do not need to call messageContext.complete() .
But since we want to show how  user can disable this feature  by calling disableAutoComplete and complete it manually (like you do in  processMessage Consumer).
We had this bug in readme and it was  left over,  since you are touching this specific part, you can fix this also.  Thank You
timeline.author: hemanttanwar

replies.bodyText:
I used disableAutoComplete in a project to fix exactly the issue you wrote.
I added the change to the pull request.
replies.author: frascu

timeline.message: add disableAutoComplete to complete/abandon the message manually
